column4: hey, i installed ubuntu, moved the tower from one house to another, now the internet doesnt work.  how do i reconfigure the tower??  i tried sudo pppoeconf, but that didnt wokr

hey, i installed ubuntu, moved the tower from one house to another, now the internet doesnt work.  how do i reconfigure the tower??  i tried sudo pppoeconf, but that didnt work.... doesnt ubuntu find it automatically?
i mean, i moved the computer from one location to the next
